scenario_text.value:
Oh, Professor? I didn’t realize you were
still here at the school.

Knowing you, I thought for sure you’d have
headed over to the shrine by now.

Haha... Given the circumstances, I didn’t
think further study would be appropriate.

Besides, with everyone looking for Aoi,
I thought it would be irresponsible of me,

as the only adult, to wait around and not do
anything. So, while I wish I could do more,

I thought the least I could do would be to
keep an eye out here while you’re gone.

Yeah, I agree that’s for the best. After all,
Aoi could always come back on her own.

Indeed. So rest assured, you can leave this
place to me. I hope you find her out there!

I believe it’s best if I stay here. Leave
this place to me, and good luck finding Aoi!
